com.wit.android.widget.adapter.internal

Interface IMultiAdapter<Adapter extends AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter>

  • Type Parameters:
    Adapter - Type of the multi-module adapter.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseCursorMultiAdapter, BaseMultiAdapter

    public interface IMultiAdapter<Adapter extends AdapterModule.ModuleAdapter>

    Interface Overview

    Required interface for multi-module adapter.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky
    See Also:
    BaseMultiAdapter

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addModule(AdapterModule<Adapter> module, int moduleID)
      Adds the AdapterModule into this adapter.
      <M> M getModule(int moduleID)
      Returns the AdapterModule of this adapter.
      void onRestoreInstanceState(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Invoked to handle restoring of the adapter state.
      void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle outState)
      Invoked to handle saving of the adapter state.

    • Method Detail

      • onSaveInstanceState

        void onSaveInstanceState(Bundle outState)

        Invoked to handle saving of the adapter state.

        Parameters:
        outState - Outgoing bundle state.

      • onRestoreInstanceState

        void onRestoreInstanceState(Bundle savedInstanceState)

        Invoked to handle restoring of the adapter state.

        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - Saved adapter state.

      • addModule

        void addModule(AdapterModule<Adapter> module,
             int moduleID)

        Adds the AdapterModule into this adapter.

        Parameters:
        module - Specific module.
        moduleID - Module id by which can be the module later obtained.

      • getModule

        <M> M getModule(int moduleID)

        Returns the AdapterModule of this adapter.

        Parameters:
        moduleID - Id of the module.
        Returns:
        Specific adapter module or null if there is no module for the requested id. See {@link
